comments.body:
hmmlearn has compiled code, you should indicate this using:
```
build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
```
If hmmlearn requires a C++ compiler as well add `- {{ compiler('cxx') }}`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@  script: "{{ PYTHON }} setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt "  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
